directions: Bring the brown rice and water to a boil in a saucepan. Stir the lime juice into the rice, reduce the heat to medium-low, and cover; simmer until the rice is tender and the liquid has been absorbed, 45 to 50 minutes.
Stir the cilantro and mango into the cooked rice to serve.
ingredients: 1 mango, peeled, pitted, and cut into 1/2 inch cubes
title: Mango-Lime Rice
